definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hew, hew into shape (NH Pi. hew off boughs ; Aram. [[פְּסַל]], psal=BH; Nab. [[פסלא]] stone-cutter);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[פְּסָלוֹ]] Hb Hab 2:18; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּפְסׂל]] Ex 34:4, etc.; Imv. ms. [[פֲּסָל־]] Ex 34:l De 10:1; —hew out stone tablets Ex 34:1, Ex 34:4, De 10:1, De 10:3; building-stones 1Ki 5:32; c. cogn. acc. (sf. referring to [[פֶּסֶל]]) Hb Hab 2:18.
